GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.24 to before v5.15.53
GSD.description:
net: usb: ax88179_178a: Fix packet receiving

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.53 by commit aa0806efb8f046b2354e30a641262d345527b6e3, it was introduced in version v5.15.24 by commit ffd0393adcdcefab7e131488e10dcfde5e02d6eb. For more details please see the references link.
